Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Acid Immunity
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which have an acid immunity.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Produces Resources
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which produce resources but not through the vanilla milkable or shearable options.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Caravan Resources
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which produce resources while in a caravan.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Asexual Reproduction
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which reproduce asexually.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Auto Nutrition
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which consume something not visible to the player (for example, ants).\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Blink Teleporting
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can "blink" uncontrollably between positions when wandering.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Builds Periodically
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can periodically create buildings around them.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Incident Causer
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can periodically create incidents, for example triggering an Aurora.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Weather Changer
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can change the weather when it spawns.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Corpse Decayer
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can feed by decaying corpses near them.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Dies In Set Time
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which will die after a set amount of time.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Digs Periodically
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can dig for resources periodically.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Digs When Hungry
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can dig for resources when they are hungry.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Disease Immunity
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which are immune to specific diseases.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Doesn't Flee
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which will not flee from combat.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Draftable
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which will are capable of being drafted by the player.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Electrified
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which will are capable charging nearby batteries.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Floating
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which float, ignoring terrain movement costs.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Gas Producer
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which spawn a cloud of gas around it.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Caravan Thought Giver
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which provide a thought to caravan members when in one, this can be a positive and/or negative thought.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Health Condition Giver
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which provide a health condition to nearby pawns, details will vary depending on the animal.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Highly Flammable
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which receive a health condition other than the usual Burn when set on fire, for example permanent untreatable burns.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Infector
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which have an attack with an extra chance to produce infections.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Light Need
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which require light to survive, they can survive through night but will need artificial light during longer periods of darkness like an eclipse.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Metamorphic
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can turn into a different animal after a given time.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Tame Natured
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which do not have any taming decay, they will remain tame and not return to the wild.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Healer
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which are capable of regenerating the wounds of nearby pawns, but not their own.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Fuel Producer
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which are capable refueling specific nearby buildings. Details will vary depending on the animal.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Regenerating
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which can regenerate their own wounds over time.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Untameable
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which are not capable of being tamed, if they are tamed they will very quickly untame themselves.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Thought Giver
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which are capable of providing thoughts to nearby pawns. Varies by animal.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Swallower
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which are capable of swallowing other pawns whole. Details will vary by animal.\n\nNote: Only covers specific modded animals using Vanilla Expanded Framework.
